item.title: resources & progress
item.description: Resources List of video trainings, books, audiobooks: title author added date status Markdown Mastery: Simple yet Powerful Writing Format Jason Taylor 2021-03-29 Containers in Cisco IOS-XE, IOS-XR, and NX-OS: Orchestration and Operation Yogesh Ramdoss, Nagendra Kumar Nainar 2021-03-30 AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate (SAA-C02) Adrian Cantrill 2021-04-02 Learning progress goal min 4 x 25 minute üçÖ session - The Pomodoro Technique

item.title: Day 2
item.description: Day 2 Hugo and Kiss theme seems to be working good. Now working on my markdown skills, need to say Markdown Mastery: Simple yet Powerful Writing Format by Jason Taylor is pretty good.

item.title: Day 1 - playing with Github, Hugo and Kiss theme
item.description: Day 1 Working on setting up a small site based on Hugo and Github Pages. This works great. It’s like 30 minutes and basic site is up and running.
